steps.title: Preheat Oven and Prep Pan
steps.description: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C). Butter an 8x4-inch loaf pan.

steps.title: Mash Bananas and Add Butter
steps.description: Mash the bananas and add the melted butter. Mix until completely smooth.

steps.title: Mix Remaining Ingredients
steps.description: Mix in the baking soda and salt. Stir in the sugar, beaten egg, and vanilla extract. Mix in the flour.

steps.title: Bake the Bread
steps.description: Pour the batter into your prepared loaf pan. Bake for 55 to 65 minutes at 350째F (175째C), or until a toothpick or wooden skewer inserted into the center comes out clean.

steps.title: Cool and Serve
steps.description: Remove from oven and let cool in the pan for a few minutes. Then remove the banana bread from the pan and let cool completely before serving. Slice and serve.
